description: Generates a CloudFormation template that streamlines and automates the integration of VPC flow logs with Amazon Athena. This make it easier for you to query and gain insights from VPC flow logs data. Based on the information that you provide, we configure resources in the template to do the following:

parameters.name: FlowLogId
parameters.description: The ID of the flow log.

parameters.name: ConfigDeliveryS3DestinationArn
parameters.description: To store the CloudFormation template in Amazon S3, specify the location in Amazon S3.

parameters.name: IntegrateServices
parameters.description: Information about the service integration. AthenaIntegrations (list) --- Information about the integration with Amazon Athena. (dict) --- Describes integration options for Amazon Athena. The location in Amazon S3 to store the generated CloudFormation template. The schedule for adding new partitions to the table. PartitionStartDate (datetime) --- The start date for the partition. PartitionEndDate (datetime) --- The end date for the partition.

nested_params.name: AthenaIntegrations
nested_params.description: Information about the integration with Amazon Athena.

nested_params.name: IntegrationResultS3DestinationArn
nested_params.description: The location in Amazon S3 to store the generated CloudFormation template.

nested_params.name: PartitionLoadFrequency
nested_params.description: The schedule for adding new partitions to the table.

nested_params.name: PartitionStartDate
nested_params.description: The start date for the partition.

nested_params.name: PartitionEndDate
nested_params.description: The end date for the partition.
